thought.text: Let me try to run a simple test to see if the environment can handle basic testing. Since the build is problematic, let me try to run tests using the installed astropy:

action.command: cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "import astropy.units as u; print('Astropy version:', u.__version__ if hasattr(u, '__version__') else 'unknown'); print('Basic test:', 1*u.m + 1*u.mm)"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c \"import astropy.units as u; print('Astropy version:', u.__version__ if hasattr(u, '__version__') else 'unknown'); print('Basic test:', 1*u.m + 1*u.mm)\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
